text: 🚨New research reveals that surgical site infections after spinal surgery are often caused by bacteria already present on the patient's skin! 🤯🔬 This means that hospital-acquired infections are not always to blame. 🏥🚫 The study found that 86% of the bacteria causing infections were genetically matched to bacteria the patient carried before surgery. 💪🔍 This is a game-changer! We must now focus on proper skin preparation and sterilization techniques to prevent these infections. 🧖‍♀️💦
